content: AC-D SP Type 27 Cutting/Notching wheel High-performance cut-off wheel for cutting, notching and light grinding of stainless/carbon steel using an angle grinder ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered to offer the best balance between longer disc lifetime and higher stock removal rate All-in-one angle grinder disc – rough cutting and light grinding without having to change disc Type 27 depressed center – you can work at any angle without damaging the base material ANSI B7.1 compliant and OSA certified – these cutting wheels comply with the highest safety standards Applications Notching steel and stainless steel Weld preparation or cleaning Light grinding on steel and stainless steel Cutting steel and stainless steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Steel, Stainless steel Tool type: Angle grinder Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel | Tool type | Angle grinder | Disclaimer | Use angle grinder with double-sided guard | Blade / disc shape | Depressed, Type 27 | Arbor size | 7/8 in ### ITEMS- 2234757 - Cutting disc 4.5 x 1/8 x 7/8 T1 SP - Package Size 10 pc - 2234758 - Cutting disc 5 x 1/8 x 7/8 T1 SP - Package Size 10 pc - 2234759 - Cutting disc 6 x 1/8 x 7/8 T1 SP - Package Size 10 pc
